definition: the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia/surname Yao

sentences.english: After Yao Chi, now here we stand by a landscaped area.
sentences.chinese: 过了瑶池，我们现在所在的就是仙园景区。

definition: Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
another name for 西王母[Xi1 wang2 mu3], Queen Mother of the West
Palace in the Moon (in folk tales)
Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
The Goddess, 1934 silent film about a Shanghai prostitute, directed by 吳永剛|吴永刚[Wu2 Yong3 gang1]
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
